document_data.name: Cythandria
document_data.mainbody: '''Cythandria''' was a female [[half-elf]] [[wizard]] and a member of the [[Iron Throne]] during the [[Iron Throne#Iron crisis|iron crisis]].
document_data.History: Cythandria became the lover of [[Sarevok Anchev]] in order to rise through the ranks. She confronted [[Gorion's Ward]] at the top of the [[Iron Throne]] headquarters.<ref>
